= Streaming movies using db2html =

 # Install _db2html_ from SRJG project
 # Install the latest _VLC media player_ from http://www.videolan.org/vlc/  (optional: you can also install web browser plug-in)
 # Generate HTML jukebox with _db2html_ using *-t* option. This will generate titles with hyperlink to the movie
 # Start _VLC media player_ and select *Media* -> *Open Network Stream* from main menu
 # Open http://192.168.1.15/srjg/ with your web browser and copy hyperlink to the movie you would like to play into the field shown below:

http://members.home.nl/hellmann/vlc.gif

Tip: if you have previously installed web browser plug-in, you can watch the movie directly in browser's window.
